A storybook illustration of the frog's journey to becoming a prince, complete with colorful characters and whimsical landscapes.
A musical adaptation of the classic tale, with catchy tunes and a lively cast of performers.
A retelling of the story from the frog's perspective, with a modern twist on the themes of friendship and ambition.
A collection of short stories featuring different frogs and their dreams, each with their own unique path to becoming a prince.
A video game that follows the frog's journey, with interactive puzzles and challenges that test players' problem-solving skills.
